lectures.title: Lecture 1: Introduction to Computer Animation
lectures.intro: Overview of computer animation principles, history, and fundamental concepts.

lectures.title: Lecture 2: Kinematics and Motion
lectures.intro: Forward and inverse kinematics, skeletal animation basics.

lectures.title: Lecture 3: Interpolation Techniques
lectures.intro: Linear, spline, and Bezier interpolation for smooth motion.

lectures.title: Lecture 4: Character Rigging
lectures.intro: Skeleton setup, skinning, and weight painting.

lectures.title: Lecture 5: Physics-Based Animation
lectures.intro: Particle systems, rigid body dynamics, and collision detection.

lectures.title: Lecture 6: Deformation and Morphing
lectures.intro: Mesh deformation techniques and shape interpolation.

lectures.title: Lecture 7: Motion Capture
lectures.intro: Motion capture technology and data processing.

lectures.title: Lecture 8: Procedural Animation
lectures.intro: Algorithmic animation generation and behavioral systems.

lectures.title: Lecture 9: Facial Animation
lectures.intro: Facial rigging, blend shapes, and expression systems.

lectures.title: Lecture 10: Advanced Topics
lectures.intro: Cloth simulation, fluid dynamics, and modern techniques.
